svg.text: Mining extraterrestrial life for revolutionary biotechnology and medical applications

g.text: â¢ Novel antibiotics from alien microbes
â¢ Novel drug compounds from alien biochemistry
â¢ Extremophile enzymes for targeted therapy
â¢ Radiation-resistant biomolecules for cancer treatment
â¢ Thermostable enzymes for extreme conditions
â¢ Novel materials from alien biomineralization
â¢ Life support systems for long-duration space missions
Bio-prospecting must follow strict protocols to prevent contamination and preserve alien ecosystems
International treaties required for fair distribution of benefits and protection of extraterrestrial life
